text:
Politics

In final speech, emotional Michelle Obama tells young people ‘don’t be afraid'

January 6, 2017 | 5:24 PM GMT

During her final official speech as first lady, an emotional Michelle Obama urged young people to be empowered and lead 'with hope, never fear.'
title: In final speech, emotional Michelle Obama tells young people ‘don’t be afraid'

meta_data.description: During her final official speech as first lady, an emotional Michelle Obama urged young people to be empowered and lead 'with hope, never fear.'
